suggested_topics.title: Material to grip Algae
suggested_topics.excerpt: Has there been any kind of material testing to grip the rubber Algae balls? Like how in 2024 there was the cat’s tounge tape and the silicone rubber tube covers that worked well on the notes I’m wonde…

suggested_topics.title: CANivore wiring termination conundrum
suggested_topics.excerpt: Tuned the drive motors-- the CAN appears stable, the robot moves… no idea why it works, but it does. Good luck everyone. If your CAN doesn’t read 60 ohms, add whatever resistance you need to get it t…

posters.description: Original Poster, Most Recent Poster, Accepted Answer

suggested_topics.title: Eletrical position
suggested_topics.excerpt: Nothing specifically a problem there, assuming the structure is sturdy enough that you’re not flopping around parts and having wires pull out. Might even catch fewer metal shavings that way.

suggested_topics.title: AdvantageKit RealOutputs/Console not showing up
suggested_topics.excerpt: Our RealOutputs/Console is not showing up while we are running the robot nor when we check our WPILOGs. Has anyone else seen this issue?
